title: Total Spy v3.0 + Patch.rar
description:
Includes the IwantSoft Total Spy v3.0 installation package, a patch and a text file containing instructions.

Install as usual. After installation use the provided patch. No serial number required. Done! Enjoy!


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Total Spy is an all-in-one invisible spy software! With this program you will know exactly what other users are doing on your computer. 

Total Spy records keystrokes, scans the clipboard for changes, and monitors web navigation. It also captures screenshots, so you can see exactly what other users are doing. Total Spy collects all recorded information to a hidden location on the hard drive, so you can view it later. Total Spy runs in stealth mode so other users are not aware of it's presence.

Key features:
* Invisible to everyone except you. You only have to press the hot key combination you choose to unhide Total Spy.
* Records everything that is entered from the keyboard.
* Monitors all internet navigation (visited URLs and website titles).
* Scans Windows clipboard for changes.
* Monitors the screen by taking snapshots.
* Can autostart in hidden mode upon logon, so you don't have to hide Total Spy manually after each system reboot.

Do you have children? With Total Spy you can protect them from dangerous contacts. You can read their online chats and emails along with monitoring the websites they visit. Don't hesitate! You have the right to know, because YOU ARE THE PARENT! 

Does your girl/guy cheat on you? Total Spy will help you find out whether or not your girlfriend, boyfriend, wife or husband is cheating on you when you are away.

Are you an Employer? Do all your employees use their computer resources and internet connection solely for your business? Do they work as hard when you're away as they do when you are watching over their shoulders? Do you suspect your employees' productivity is lacking? Total Spy can help! Just install it on their computers and you can view reports anytime via LAN connection.

Lost your progress typing? How many times have you lost important data typed into a text editor because your computer suddenly froze/crashed or the application aborted for no apparent reason? With Total Spy running these are worries of the past!

Take control of your computer, install Total Spy today!
